---
title: "Linear models with AD subject"
author: "Anna MacFarlane"
output: pdf_document
---

Note: blue stars on upper plots denote subject with AD, and green squares
indicate subjects with MCI

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE)
#tinytex::install_tinytex()
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
data <- read.csv("AD_DECODE_data.csv")

view(data)
#ad_pat <- which(data$risk_for_ad == 2)

ad <- data %>% 
  #filter(! is.na(Weight)) %>% 
  mutate(sex = case_when(
    sex == "F" ~ "Female",
    sex == "M" ~ "Male"
  )) %>% 
  filter(risk_for_ad != 3) %>% 
  filter(risk_for_ad != 2)

# data by genotypes
e23 <- ad %>% 
  filter(genotype == "APOE23") 
e33 <- ad %>% 
  filter(genotype == "APOE33")
e34 <- ad %>% 
  filter(genotype == "APOE34")

# combining genotypes 
geno_combined <- ad %>% 
  mutate(Genotype = case_when(
    genotype == "APOE23" | genotype == "APOE33" ~ "APOE3",
    genotype == "APOE34" | genotype == "APOE44" ~ "APOE4"
  )) 

# separating by sex
combo_f <- geno_combined %>% 
  filter(sex == "Female")

combo_m <- geno_combined %>% 
  filter(sex == "Male")

f_facet <- data %>% 
  filter(risk_for_ad == 3 | risk_for_ad == 2)  %>% 
  filter(sex == "Female")

m_facet <- data %>% 
  filter(risk_for_ad == 3 | risk_for_ad == 2)  %>% 
  filter(sex == "Male")
  
```

```{r ufov-1, echo = FALSE}
plot1<-ggplot(geno_combined, aes(x = age, y = ufov1,
                                 color = Genotype,  fill = Genotype)) + 
  geom_point(aes(shape = Risk)) +
  geom_smooth(formula = y ~ x, method = "lm", alpha = 0.2) +
  labs(title = "UFOV1 scores linear model",
       subtitle = "Both males and females",
       x = "Age", y = "UFOV1 score") +
  theme_bw() +
  background_grid(major = "xy", minor = "none") +
  #annotate("point", x = 82, y = data, colour = "blue")
  annotate("point", x = data$age[49], y = data$ufov1[49], colour = "blue", shape = 8) +
  annotate("point", x = data$age[23], y = data$ufov1[23], colour = "darkgreen", shape = 9) +
  annotate("point", x = data$age[54], y = data$ufov1[54], colour = "darkgreen", shape = 9) +
  annotate("point", x = data$age[56], y = data$ufov1[56], colour = "darkgreen", shape = 9) +
  annotate("point", x = data$age[58], y = data$ufov1[58], colour = "darkgreen", shape = 9)

plot2 <- ggplot(geno_combined, aes(age, ufov1, 
                                   color = Genotype, fill = Genotype)) + 
  geom_point(aes(shape = Risk)) + 
  facet_grid(. ~ sex) + 
  stat_smooth(method = "lm", alpha = 0.2) +
  background_grid(major = 'xy', minor = "none") + # add thin horizontal lines 
  panel_border() + 
  theme_bw()+
  labs(x = "Age", y = "UFOV1 score") +
  theme(legend.position="none") 

ggdraw() + 
  draw_plot(plot1, 0, .5, 1, .5) +
  draw_plot(plot2, 0, 0, 1, .5) 

lm <- lm(ufov1 ~ age*Genotype*sex, geno_combined)
summary(lm)

lm_f <- lm(ufov1 ~ age*Genotype, combo_f)
summary(lm_f)

lm_m <- lm(ufov1 ~ age*Genotype, combo_m)
summary(lm_m)

anova(lm)
anova(lm_f)
anova(lm_m)

```
